keyEvents.title: Enel Joins Survival Game
keyEvents.description: Enel personally enters Upper Yard to participate in the survival game, confronting fighters directly.
keyEvents.significance: Upper Yard becomes the battleground for Enel's overwhelming display of power.

keyEvents.title: 1,000,000 Volt Vari Devastates Area
keyEvents.description: Enel's electrical attack travels through Upper Yard's Milky Road, affecting a wide area.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the dangerous and conductive nature of Upper Yard's environment.

keyEvents.title: Conis and Pagaya Navigate Through
keyEvents.description: Conis and Pagaya successfully navigate the dangerous Upper Yard to reach the Going Merry.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the persistent dangers in Upper Yard beyond just the survival game combatants.

description: The forbidden holy ground of Skypiea, formerly part of Jaya before being launched into the sky. Site of the survival game where Enel tests fighters.
significance: Central location for the Skypiea Arc's main conflicts and the survival game.

keyEvents.title: Electrical Attack Travels Through Milky Road
keyEvents.description: Enel's 1,000,000 Volt Vari attack travels through the Milky Road's conductive surface, defeating 20 fighters.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals that the Milky Road can conduct electricity, making it particularly dangerous against Enel's powers.

description: Cloud pathways in Skypiea that fighters use to navigate. The conductive properties make them dangerous conduits for Enel's electrical attacks.
significance: The conductive nature of the Milky Road amplifies Enel's attack range and effectiveness.

keyEvents.title: Battle Against Hotori and Kotori
keyEvents.description: Nami and Gan Fall defend the Going Merry against the twin priests Hotori and Kotori.
keyEvents.significance: The Going Merry serves as a safe haven for unconscious crew members and a defensive position.

keyEvents.title: Conis, Pagaya, and Aisa Arrive
keyEvents.description: Conis, Pagaya, and Aisa successfully locate and reach the Going Merry with supplies.
keyEvents.significance: The ship becomes a rallying point for allies in Upper Yard.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' ship, currently anchored in Upper Yard. Serves as a base and refuge during the survival game.
significance: Safe location where injured crew members recover and allies gather.
